records.name: Purpose and Emotional Clarity
records.description: Anja Chakra - a sense of intuition, overall life-purpose. It's self-realization and the ability to have insights.  How do you feel about your right to "see" clearly?

records.name: Decision Making & Reliability
records.description: Visuddha Charka - a sense of self-expression, truthfulness, loyalty. How do you feel about your right to speak, be heard, and trust?

records.name: Relationships & Confidence
records.description: Anahata Chakra - a sense of contentment, compassion. It's about your relationships, openness, forgiveness of self and others. How do you feel about your right to accept yourself for who you are?

records.name: Academics & Motivation
records.description: Manipura Charka - a sense of control, the "self." It's how you feel about your vocation, personal power, your self-confidence. How valuable and influential do you feel about your right to think and contribute?

records.name: Stress & Emotional Wellbeing
records.description: Svadisthana Chakra - a sense of feeling, the creative and life force. It's how you sense, your vitality, sexuality, intimacy, and creativity. How sparked and energized are you about your right to experience and feel?

records.name: Sleep, Nutrition, & Exercise
records.description: Muladhara Chakra - a sense of survival, the basic instinct, like having food, water, shelter, you know...the essentials. How do you feel about satisfying your basic needs and right to live?

records.name: Sense of Self and Belonging
records.description: Sahasrara Chakra - a sense of connection. It's trusting the universe and the course of life, a sense of the bigger picture. How connected and trusting do you feel about your right to experience consciousness?
